about_the_game:
Embark on a journey of blinding freedom and adventure in COLLAPSE MACHINE, a groundbreaking open-world experience that redefines the limits of exploration. You'll traverse a sprawling, immersive world. Your home is not just a static structure but a moving fortress on wheels, capable of carrying you and all your possessions as you roam the wasteland. Gather your friends and embark on an epic quest to conquer the unknown.

The game's emphasis on immersion. Every aspect of the world feels alive, inviting you to interact with in natural ways. From secret passages to hidden treasures, every corner holds the promise of adventure. And with minimal UI, you're free to immerse yourself fully in the experience, relying on your instincts and senses to guide you.

But it's not just about exploration; it's about the thrill of discovery. Uncover hidden secrets, collect unique items, and hoard them in your mobile home like a true adventurer. Every item tells a story, and it's up to you to uncover its secrets.

And what's an adventure without companions? COLLAPSE MACHINE supports seamless co-op multipler, allowing you to embark on this epic journey with friends by your side. Together, you'll conquer challenges, explore uncharted territories, and forge unforgettable memories.

So, are you ready to embark on the adventure of a lifetime? Join us in COLLAPSE MACHINE and journey beyond boundaries. The wasteland awaits.

name: COLLAPSE MACHINE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 6000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: COLLAPSE MACHINE offers the ultimate adventure in an infinite procedural immersive world. Traverse the sands in a mobile home vehicles, exploring secrets and treasures with friends (or foes), all while experiencing the thrill of discovery without constraints
